# SKProduct.PeriodUnit

**Enumeration**

Values representing the duration of an interval, from a day up to a year.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PeriodUnit
```

## Overview

The period unit represents the duration of an interval. Period units are used with the number of units to determine one period in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductSubscriptionPeriod].

## Period Units

- **SKProduct.PeriodUnit.day**: An interval lasting one day.
- **SKProduct.PeriodUnit.month**: An interval lasting one month.
- **SKProduct.PeriodUnit.week**: An interval lasting one week.
- **SKProduct.PeriodUnit.year**: An interval lasting one year.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting Subscription Information

- **subscriptionGroupIdentifier**: The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs.
- **subscriptionPeriod**: The period details for products that are subscriptions.
- **SKProductSubscriptionPeriod**: An object containing the subscription period duration information.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
